frontMatter.title: Perimeter of square
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to find perimeter of square

contentHtml:
Write a programme to find perimeter of square

Perimeter of square = 4 * side

side : 4

perimeter : 16
markdown:
## Write a programme to find perimeter of square

Perimeter of square = 4 \* side

```txt
side : 4

perimeter : 16
```
